name: Grow A Bit
description:
Grow A Bit is a top-down runner where you play as BitBot, an innocent Bit trapped in a Hard Drive. To escape, he must collect other bits by travelling there and back again around the disc. He must also escape processing by the EVIL Read and Write Head.

Move with WASD or Arrows

This is our first step into game development, any and all comments and suggestions are welcome. Thank you and Enjoy!

(Also menu backgrounds were taken from google images)
